data.actual_result: The text channel and the channel list have different behaviours
data.expected_result: When an action menu appears, scrolling should be disabled, or AT LEAST be consistant thoughout text channels and channel lists
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any guild (where you are admin) - Tap and hold on any channel - When the actions menu appears, keep holding your finger - Move your finger up and down, and see how the channel list is scrolling in the background - Now, go into a text channel - Tap and hold on a message - When the actions menu appears, keep holding your finger - Move your finger up and down, and notice that you are not scrolling in the text channel in the background
